Internal workhorse for Slater standardization.

Source: R/distance.R
slaterStandardization.Rd

Function uses a matrix as input. All overhead of repgrid class is avoided. Needed for speedy simulations.

Usage

slaterStandardization(x)

Arguments

x

A matrix.
